meanings.definition: A sweet, spicy cake or cookie made with ginger, molasses, and other ingredients.
meanings.sent1: I baked delicious gingerbread cookies for the school bake sale.
meanings.sent2: During the holidays, many people enjoy decorating gingerbread houses.
meanings.sent3: The gingerbread man ran away from the hungry children in the fairytale.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked gingerbread filled the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The gingerbread was so soft and chewy, it melted in my mouth.

meanings.definition: A type of light brown color.
meanings.sent1: The artist used gingerbread paint to create a warm tone in the painting.
meanings.sent2: Her new dress was a lovely shade of gingerbread.
meanings.sent3: The walls of the house were painted in a soothing gingerbread color.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in beautiful hues of gingerbread.
meanings.sent5: The gingerbread color of the leaves in autumn was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Elaborate or fancy ornamentation, especially on a building.
meanings.sent1: The old mansion was adorned with intricate gingerbread trim.
meanings.sent2: The gingerbread details on the cathedral were truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: The gingerbread decorations on the house made it look like a fairy tale castle.
meanings.sent4: The gingerbread embellishments on the building added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The gingerbread designs on the roof were a masterpiece of craftsmanship.
